data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Champasak, Laos to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Champasak, Laos
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: There are 575,600 people living in the state of Champasak. Only about 14,630 might be believers.
Father, let those from the 14,630 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Champasak, Laos from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, 1.6% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Champasak.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Champasak to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Champasak, Laos has a population of 575,600.

We estimate Champasak has 14,630 people who might know Jesus, 7,091 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 553,879 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 39 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 14,630 believers in Champasak against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

location.name: Champasak
location.cities_list: Pakse, Muang Không, Champasak, Pakxong, Phônthong
